amendment.description: An amendment numbered 31 printed in Part B of House Report 118-261 to increase and decrease funding by $1 million for tenant-based rental assistance to express support for Public Housing Authorities to conduct drug testing as a condition of public housing benefits.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Strong amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Strong amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Strong amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
